            COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT,TF035455-GZ - WEST BANK AND GAZA PROGRAM,TF024112-WBG - COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF022790-TREE CROP PROCESSING,TF024114-CANADIAN COFINANCING FOR WBG
            COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
This Community Development Project seeks
            to improve the availability and quality of economic and
            social infrastructure services in small municipalities and
            villages in the West Bank and Gaza (WBG).  The project
            consists of 3 main components.  The civil works component
            deals with the implementation of at least 250 infrastructure
            microprojects.  The project management component will handle
            supplemental operating costs, vehicles, communications and
            other equipment, training and impact studies needed for
            project execution and management.  The institution building
            component will encompass subcontract agreements to provide training.
